```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
names(diamonds)

dim(diamonds)

summary(diamonds)

head(diamonds)

tail(diamonds)

skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r}
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, y = carat)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```
